paper_abstract: Let G(1) and G(2) be two connected graphs. The Kronecker product G(1) x G(2) has vertex set V(G(1) x G(2)) = V(G(1)) x V(G(2)) and the edge set E(G(1) x G(2)) = {(u(1), v(1))(u(2), v(2)): u(1)u(2) is an element of E(G(1)), v(1)v(2) is an element of E(G(2))}. In this paper, we show that if G is a bipartite graph with kappa(G) = delta(G), then G x K(n)(n >= 3) is super-kappa. (C) 2010 Elsevier B.V. All rights reserved.
paper_title: Super connectivity of Kronecker products of graphs
